pda.view

Class PdaView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • pda.view.PdaView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class PdaView
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    The base class of PDA simulator. This class displays the PDA emulator and manage all the applications
    Version:
    $Revision: 1-2013 $
    Author:
    F. Merciol, D. Deveaux MAJ J-F. Kamp I.Borne <{francois.merciol|daniel.deveaux}@univ-ubs.fr>
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
